title: Area and perimeter
desc: Calculation of area and perimeter of plane geometry

title: Trigonometric Functions
desc: The online trigonometric function worksheet helps to quickly and accurately calculate problems about trigonometric functions

title: Equation
desc: In mathematics, an equation is a statement that asserts the equality of two expressions. Equations in other languages can have many different meanings.

title: Logarit
desc: Logarithmic concept: for two positive numbers a, b with a ≠ 1. The number α satisfying the equality 𝑎α=𝑏 is called the logarithm of base a of b and is denoted 𝑙𝑜𝑔𝑎𝑏

title: Exponential
desc: Power is a mathematical operation, written in the form 𝑎𝑛, consisting of two numbers, a being the base and n being the exponent or power, and pronounced “a to a power of n.
